title: Johannesbad Tele Reha
description:
Johannesbad Tele Reha powered by Caspar

Use your therapist's knowledge at home:

Your individual training plan customized by your therapist is always available

Relaxation and knowledge for a more effective therapy

Further extensive support

Your individual training plan:

Created by your therapist

Configured according to your personal needs

User-friendly training videos:

The Johannesbad Tele Reha App is very easy to use

Allow you to understand the correct exercise techniques enabling you to train well on your own

Monitor your therapy progress:

Connect your fitness wearables or Apple Watch with the Johannesbad Tele Reha App and be informed about your activity goals. 

Rate your exercises and note your progress

Discuss results with your therapist

Get more in-depth therapy:

The Johannesbad Tele Reha App allows you to exercise correctly with the appropriate intensity

Helps you optimize your therapy for significant improvements

We use Google Health Connect to securely collect step data from your device to enhance your health tracking experience.

Submit your suggestions for improvements to support@caspar-health.com as we value your feedback.”
